interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Spray Bottle,Fine Mist Mini Clear50ml/2oz Spray Bottles,Small Reusable Empty Plastic Bottles with Atomizer Pumps (25 pack,2 Funnels included)
Review Date: 2020/11/02
Store: Woaiwo-q
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Woaiwo-q', 'Material': 'Polypropylene', 'Capacity': '50 Milliliters, 60 Milliliters', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Special Feature': 'Mist Spray'}
Review Text: These are nice small, short plastic bottles.  The bottles are approx 3" tall.  Each bottle comes with a fine spray mister.  The bottles hold 2 oz each.  These are nice small bottles.  These only come out to be 32 cents each.  They are will worth this cost if you need bottles this small.
Review Title: Small Short Fine Mist Plastic Bottle
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Del Monte Sauerkraut 14.5 oz. (3-Pack) {'Package Dimensions': '8.4 x 4.9 x 2.9 inches; 14.46 Ounces', 'UPC': '741655221609'} We have strayed from a national name brand of sauer kraut and was that a big mistake. The store brand was one that almost everyone set aside on their plate and did not eat. We went back to a name brand and that was Del Monte. The kraut we think is the best on the market. We do nto like that other kinds of kraut such as Bavarian. We want the real stuff, at least to us it is the real stuff. Did you know the whole 14.5 oz can only has 10 calories in it and zero fat. Even for carbs there is only 1g. Now this is where we definitely go wrong as we serve it with smoked sausage, which we know is totally off the chart. Don't do this often---just occasionally. The meal is delicious. I do have a note fro Del Monte. Remember when your cans contained 16 oz of kraut, then you cut back and now it's 14.5 oz. Please quit doing this to us!.Do you realize, and I am sure you do, that I now have about 10% LESS to serve to my family. Some Of The Best Sauer Kraut There Is ! Spa Grade Jade Roller for Face with Gua Sha | Jade Face Roller Massager | Jade Facial Roller | Face Roller Massager | Jade Rollers | Wrinkle Roller Jane Cosmetics {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.1 x 3.4 x 1.2 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'UPC': '814689026516', 'Manufacturer': 'Jane & Co.'} This Jade face roller and Jade Gua Sha tool comes packaged nicely. This roller is a little nicer than the last one I reviewed, therefore the reason for the 5 start. We enjoy using this one more than our other one. This is better put together and seems to be a grade or two better. Jade Roller Mountain Falls Regular Nail Polish Remover for Natural Nails with Vitamin E and Panthenol, 10 Fluid Ounce Mountain Falls {'Brand': 'Mountain Falls', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Item Weight': '0.7 Pounds', 'Unit Count': '10 Fl Oz'} Another quality product from Mountain Falls. This Regular Nail Polish Remover does its job. It is easy to remove old nail polish using this product. This is a 10 oz bottle of polish remover. Good nail polish remover. Works Well. Wonder4 Electric Callus Remover - Rechargeable Electric Foot File Callus Shaver Hard Skin Remover Pedicure Tools with 3 in 1 Roller Heads, for Cracked Heels Calluses and Dead Skin Wonder4 {'Brand': 'Wonder4', 'Is Electric': 'Yes', 'Item Form': 'Roller', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Unit Count': '11.4 Ounce'} I already have a single disk callus remover but this triple disk callus remover is much nicer. This remover has 1 head that rotates to 3 different buffing disks. There is a rough, medium and smooth grinding disk. These disk do a great job. There is a small cleaning brush and a USB cord include. The device appears to be well made. The speed on the head is good and does not slow down when using. I have only charged this device once and it is still running. This is a good product at a good price. Highly recommend. Good Triple Disk Callus Remover DAN Technology Anti-Scald 200℉-500℉ Electric Press Hot Comb for Black Hair, Beard and Wigs, Ceramic Unisex Hair Beard Straightener and Curler, Dual Voltage for Travel, Home and Salon Use DAN Technology {'Brand': 'DAN Technology', 'Hair Type': 'All, Curly', 'Material': 'Ceramic', 'Size': 'Medium', 'Item Weight': '0.6 Pounds', 'Package Dimensions': '12.9 x 4.8 x 2.4 inches; 9.6 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'DAN Technology'} My daughter really likes this Dan Technology Hot Comb.

There are several features that she likes.
1. The cord swivels 360 degrees. No more tangled up cord.
2. Variable temperature. (200-500 degree)
3. Fairly fast heat up.
4. Easy grip handle. The handle is small enough for her to grip easily.
5. The head still heated the entire time she was doing her hair.

She is happy with this heated comb. Daughter Likes This Straightening Hot Comb MEACOLIA Water Mist Empty Spray Bottle for Hair,Plastic Spray Bottle for Cleaning Solutions,Refillable Container with Adjustable Head(Pack of 3,8 oz) MEACOLIA {'Brand': 'MEACOLIA', 'Capacity': '2.4 Pounds', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Special Feature': 'Adjustable Head, Mist Spray', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Hand Wash Only', 'Package Dimensions': '10.08 x 6.85 x 3.23 inches; 4.97 Ounces', 'UPC': '190431086381'} There are 3 clear plastic spray bottles in this set. All the bottles are the same 8 oz size. I like the spray handles. They fit in my hand and are easy to spray. The sprayer can be set 3 ways.... OFF, STREAM, and MIST. I am currently using the mist on my plants. The liquid comes out evenly and does not drip out of the nozzle. The pick up hose inside the bottle goes all the way to the bottom so you get all the liquid. These are 3 good spray bottles and well worth the price. Good size plastic spray bottles Spray Bottle,Fine Mist Mini Clear50ml/2oz Spray Bottles,Small Reusable Empty Plastic Bottles with Atomizer Pumps (25 pack,2 Funnels included) Woaiwo-q {'Brand': 'Woaiwo-q', 'Material': 'Polypropylene', 'Capacity': '50 Milliliters, 60 Milliliters', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Special Feature': 'Mist Spray'} These are nice small, short plastic bottles. The bottles are approx 3" tall. Each bottle comes with a fine spray mister. The bottles hold 2 oz each. These are nice small bottles. These only come out to be 32 cents each. They are will worth this cost if you need bottles this small. Small Short Fine Mist Plastic Bottle
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Brand Loyalty:** Maintains a preference for national name brands, valuing recognized quality and reliability in product performance.

- **Product Preferences:** Demonstrates a strong inclination toward practical and multifunctional tools that enhance user experience, particularly in personal care and household categories. Recent interactions show a commitment to well-designed, user-friendly products, including portable and versatile containers.

- **Health-Conscious Choices:** Holds a consistent focus on low-calorie, low-fat food options while still enjoying indulgent treats. This health-centric approach extends to personal care products, emphasizing natural ingredients and effectiveness for overall well-being.

- **Consumer Advocacy:** Remains vigilant about product consistency and transparency, prioritizing high-quality standards in food and wellness items.

- **Culinary Traditions and Self-Care:** Shows an enthusiasm for integrating flavorful condiments with meals, balancing healthful eating with enjoyment. Positive feedback on functional self-care items highlights a dedication to enhancing wellness practices through thoughtful design.

The user's recent purchase of practical, small containers reflects an ongoing preference for high-quality, user-friendly products that emphasize functionality and convenience across various areas of life. Their balanced approach consistently prioritizes quality, thoughtful design, and health-conscious choices, while still allowing for enjoyable culinary experiences.
